revision.text:
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Repulsor Cuffs |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts aggro reduction by 50% when targeted by an enemy. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 6060 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Repulsor Cuffs |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts aggro reduction by 55% when targeted by an enemy. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 6060 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Repulsor Cuffs |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts aggro reduction by 60% when targeted by an enemy. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 6060 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Repulsor Cuffs''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Resistance Down |caption = Reduces resistance to debuffs. |image = XC3 Resistance Down.png |type = Debuff |attribute = Ether |base-duration = 15.0s |max-duration = 30.0s |success-rate = 75% |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base Resistance Decrease |effect-value-1 = 25% }} '''Resistance Down''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It reduces the affected character's resistances, not only to debuffs, but also to reactions.<ref>[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jk31xdLvfPrOjoQtGr-6PRH_4Cd2B_k_dFGSS6vSJ1g#heading=h.63a6wwimgpxw Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Postgame Combat: Guide and Mechanics] - Miscellaneous Formulas section with formulas for reaction success rate</ref>
==Distribution== *[[Terror Onslaught]] ([[Machine Assassin]]; only applied when hitting from the back) *[[Hydra Gas]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Demonic Krenolur]]) *[[Seventh Edge (XC3)|Seventh Edge]] ([[Segiri]]; only applied when hitting from the back)
==References== <references></references>
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox item |name = Resplendent Armring |image = |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 40% when HP is at 90% or higher. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = [[Prize X-change Blue]] |sell = [[Gold|G]] }} '''Resplendent Armrings''' are DLC [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. It can be purchased from [[Prize X-change Blue]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] for 6000 [[Noponstone]]s. {{clr}}..."
